attributes.action: To reduce fuel bills by crediting consumers with carbon footprint savings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having recently retired from Government Service and noted commercials urging reduction of an individual's carbon footprint by reducing car travel by 5 miles per day. I have reduced my carbon footprint by at least 45 miles per day and the Prime Minister (Government) should recognise such contributions and make credits/payments available for use in respect of fuel costs to assist the elderly.
Any failure to offer credits/payments will undoubtedly result in a suitable response from the electorate. We have given you and this country our lives, be grateful.
We are not comparing our service to that of the armed forces who more than deserve everything this country can give.
Just enough to survive with a home, heat, light, food and a little bit over with which to LIVE.
Civil servants have accepted lower pay increases, lesser conditions on the basis of our duty to the Crown and that compensation will be received with retirement.
Let it be so. I have personally given this country, the Government and my Sovereign 42 years of my life.
Time for payback.
